attributes.action: Re-Instate The N213 Night Bus Service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As of the 4th July 2009, the N213 night bus service has been cancelled. A 24 hour 213 service is now in place, but this does not include the old route n213 between Sutton & Croydon. People living in Roundshaw, Wallington and Carshalton, and other areas inbetween have no public transports links to get home from Sutton or Croydon after about 12:30am. This will lead to an increase in unlicensed taxis, drink driving and people walking home, leading to muggings and other such things. We would like either for the 213 route to be extended to Croydon, as it was, or for a 24hr 154 service to be put in place.
